edu.rit.pj2.vbl

Class HistogramVbl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.HistogramVbl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, Vbl, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleHistogramVbl, FloatHistogramVbl, IntHistogramVbl, LongHistogramVbl, ObjectHistogramVbl

    public abstract class HistogramVbl
extends Object
implements Vbl, Streamable
    Class HistogramVbl is the abstract base class for a histogram that categorizes values into bins and counts the number of occurrences in each bin. Subclasses of class HistogramVbl categorize items of various types.

    Class HistogramVbl supports doing a chi-square test on the bin counts. See the chisqr(), pvalue(), and expectedCount() methods.

    Class HistogramVbl supports the parallel reduction pattern. Each thread creates a thread-local copy of the shared variable by calling the threadLocal() method of class Loop or the threadLocal() method of class Section. Each thread performs operations on its own copy, without needing to synchronize with the other threads. At the end of the parallel statement, the thread-local copies are automatically reduced together, and the result is stored in the original shared variable. The reduction is performed by the shared variable's reduce() method.

        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if B < 2.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear this histogram. All the bin counts are set to zero.

        Parameters:

      • total

        public long total()
        Returns the total count in all bins of this histogram.
        Returns:
        Total count.

      • chisqr

        public double chisqr()
        Returns the chi-square statistic for this histogram. The expected count in bin i is determined by calling the expectedCount(i) method.
        Returns:
        Chi-square statistic.

      • pvalue

        public double pvalue(double chisqr)
        Returns the p-value of the given chi-square statistic for this histogram. The chi-square statistic is assumed to obey the chi-square distribution with B−1 degrees of freedom, where B is the number of bins.
        Parameters:
        chisqr - Chi-square statistic.
        Returns:
        P-value of chisqr.

        Parameters:
        vbl - Shared variable.

      • reduce

        public void reduce(Vbl vbl)
        Reduce the given shared variable into this shared variable.

        The reduction is performed by adding the count in each bin of vbl to the count in the corresponding bin of this histogram.

        Specified by:
        reduce in interface Vbl
        Parameters:
        vbl - Shared variable.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if vbl does not have the same number of bins as this histogram.

      • writeOut

              throws IOException

      • increment

        protected void increment(int i)
        Increment the given bin in this histogram. The subclass of class HistogramBin determines the manner in which values are categorized into bins.
        Parameters:
        i - Bin number.

      • expectedCount

        protected double expectedCount(int i)
        Determine the expected count in the given bin for a chi-square test.

        The base class implementation of this method assumes that the bin counts are supposed to be all the same; thus, the expected count in each bin is the total count divided by the number of bins. A subclass can override this method to return different expected counts.

        Parameters:
        i - Bin number.
        Returns:
        Expected count in bin i.
